description.zh-cn: 西汉最后一位名义上的君主，以皇太子身份在位，被称为“孺子婴”。他是汉宣帝的玄孙，从未正式登基。在新朝建立后被废黜并幽禁，最终在更始政权时期被杀害。
description.en: The last nominal monarch of the Western Han dynasty, who reigned as Crown Prince and was known as 'Ruzi Ying'. He was a great-great-grandson of Emperor Xuan of Han and never formally ascended the throne. After the establishment of the Xin dynasty, he was deposed, imprisoned, and eventually killed during the Gengshi regime.

description.zh-cn: 西汉末年的权臣，后篡夺汉朝皇位，建立新朝。
description.en: An influential official in the late Western Han dynasty who later usurped the Han throne and established the Xin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，于公元前202年由刘邦建立，于公元9年1月15日被王莽所篡。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, founded by Liu Bang in 202 BC and usurped by Wang Mang on January 15, 9 AD.

description.zh-cn: 由王莽建立的中国历史朝代，介于西汉与东汉之间。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by Wang Mang, existing between the Western Han and Eastern Han dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 新朝末年由绿林军拥立的汉朝皇帝，建立了更始政权。
description.en: An emperor of the Han dynasty installed by the Lülin army during the late Xin dynasty, who established the Gengshi regime.

description.zh-cn: 新朝末年拥立孺子婴为天子的平陵人。
description.en: A person from Pingling who supported Liu Ying as emperor during the late Xin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 更始帝时期的丞相，奉命进攻并杀害了孺子婴。
description.en: Chancellor under Emperor Gengshi, who was ordered to attack and kill Ruzi Ying.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第十四位皇帝，孺子婴的前任。
description.en: The 14th emperor of the Western Han dynasty, predecessor to Ruzi Ying.

description.zh-cn: 孺子婴的妻子，王莽的孙女。
description.en: Wife of Ruzi Ying and granddaughter of Wang Mang.

description.zh-cn: 王莽的长子，王夫人之父。
description.en: The eldest son of Wang Mang and father of Lady Wang.

description.zh-cn: 广戚侯，孺子婴的父亲。
description.en: Marquis of Guangqi, father of Ruzi Ying.

description.zh-cn: 广戚炀侯，孺子婴的祖父。
description.en: Marquis Yang of Guangqi, grandfather of Ruzi Ying.

description.zh-cn: 楚孝王，汉宣帝之子，孺子婴的曾祖父。
description.en: King Xiao of Chu, son of Emperor Xuan of Han, and great-grandfather of Ruzi Ying.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第十位皇帝，孺子婴的高祖父。
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Western Han dynasty, great-great-grandfather of Ruzi Ying.

description.zh-cn: 王莽在建立新朝后授予刘婴的爵位。
description.en: The title of nobility granted to Liu Ying by Wang Mang after establishing the Xin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 王莽在篡位前使用的头衔，意为代理皇帝。
description.en: The title used by Wang Mang before usurping the throne, meaning 'Regent Emperor' or 'Acting Emperor'.

description.zh-cn: 刘婴被王莽立为汉平帝的嗣君，接替其皇位。
description.en: Liu Ying was installed by Wang Mang as the heir to Emperor Ping, thus succeeding him to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 为便于掌控朝局，王莽在汉宣帝的玄孙中选择并拥立了年仅周岁的刘婴为皇太子，号“孺子”。
description.en: To facilitate his control over the court, Wang Mang selected and installed the one-year-old Liu Ying, a great-great-grandson of Emperor Xuan, as the Crown Prince with the title 'Ruzi'.

description.zh-cn: 王莽建立新朝后，废黜刘婴并将其封为定安公，随后将其幽禁于高墙府第之中，使其与世隔绝。
description.en: After establishing the Xin dynasty, Wang Mang deposed Liu Ying, enfeoffed him as the Duke of Ding'an, and subsequently imprisoned him in a walled mansion, isolating him from the world.

description.zh-cn: 以皇太子身份作为名义上的西汉君主。
description.en: Served as the nominal monarch of the Western Han dynasty with the title of Crown Prince.

description.zh-cn: 平陵人方望等人认为更始帝必败，而刘婴才是天子正统，便起兵将刘婴迎至临泾，拥立为天子。
description.en: Fang Wang and others from Pingling believed that the Gengshi Emperor was doomed to fail and that Liu Ying was the legitimate Son of Heaven, so they raised troops, welcomed Liu Ying to Linjing, and installed him as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 更始帝派遣丞相李松进攻临泾，最终杀害了被方望等人拥立为天子的刘婴。
description.en: The Gengshi Emperor dispatched Chancellor Li Song to attack Linjing, ultimately killing Liu Ying, who had been installed as emperor by Fang Wang and others.

description.zh-cn: 王莽篡汉，正式登基称帝，结束了西汉的统治。
description.en: Wang Mang usurped the Han throne, formally ascended as emperor, and ended the rule of the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 王莽在正式篡位前，以“安汉公”身份受册封为“假皇帝”（即摄皇帝），代行天子之政。
description.en: Before his formal usurpation, Wang Mang, as the Duke of Anhan, was enfeoffed as the 'Acting Emperor' (i.e., Regent Emperor) to exercise the Son of Heaven's authority.
